title: egidoval
author: egidoval
content: Hello Everyone!My name is Egido Val and iÂ´m an artist.Been on and off with bitcoin for years.Today i just made this art inspired by Banksy and Bitcoin. Hope you like it!Feel free to share. If you want to see more of my art just look into my username on twitter @egidovalhttps://i.ibb.co/fQrS3bg/Bitcoin-Thrower.png

comments.body: Nice artÂ  If you are looking to sell some pieces you can always post in collectibles  - inÂ  this section of the forum you can sell bitcoin related pieces for BTCÂ  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=217.0Take a look around and see if it works for you. comments.author: AndyGryffindor
comments.body: Isn't Banksy Satoshi Nakamoto? Says so in the genesis block."The Times 03/Jan/2009 Chancellor on brink of second bailout for banksÃ¿". Starving artists and so on...  Hopefully it all worked out for him.

comments.author: Zergal
comments.body: Nice art buddy, do you have created more art than this one?

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I really enjoyed your artwork and am a fan of Banksy. He is a controversial graffiti artist, which in my opinion his artwork has a purpose. Graffiti art itself has a history, as a form of visual message to express oneâ€™s opinion or plain simply to express a purpose. Banksy is voiceful in his artwork, whether it is a deep feeling of anger, love, and even hate. He voices out his opinion on politics to even save endangered animals. I admire his work greatly and if I had the artistic talent, I would do the same thing. He certainly contributed to changing how art is viewed throughout the world. Especially paving the way for those who have a similar talent. Banksyâ€™s art is good work, one should take their time to actually sit and actually evaluate it like you are in a museum.
